notes.title: Buy Yoshi's Birthday Gift
notes.details: Maybe tomorrow, I’ll want to settle down, Until tomorrow, I’ll just keep moving on.

notes.title: Pay the milkman
notes.details: Ulysses — always fighting all the evil forces bringing peace and justice to all.

notes.title: Check my promo codes
notes.details: Thundercats are on the move, Thundercats are loose. Feel the magic, hear the roar. Thundercats!

notes.title: Make a new website banner
notes.details: I never spend much time in school but I taught ladies plenty. It’s true I hire my body out for pay, hey hey. I’ve gotten burned over Cheryl Tiegs, blown up for Raquel Welch. But when I end up in the hay it’s only hay, hey hey. I might jump an open drawbridge, or Tarzan from a vine. ’Cause I’m the unknown stuntman that makes Eastwood look so fine.

notes.title: Mario's Birthday Present
notes.details: Cloud lakitu slide fire flower pipe jump swim, lava slide koopa troopa side-scrolling starman fire bar koopa paratroopa! Pipe cloud buzzy beetle koopa troopa game over, goomba invincible Mario.
